text: marrearu vibhagattinre melum kurramilla.(yud'dhattinu peakan) ni avarkku vahanam nalkunnatin venti avar ninre atutt vannappeal ni parannu: ninnalkk nalkan yatearu vahanavum nan kantettunnilla. annane (yud'dhattin venti) celavalikkan yateannum kantettattatinre perilulla duhkhattal kannukalil ninn kannunir olukikkeant avar tiriccupeayi. (annaneyulla oru vibhagattinre mel
